entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -9.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 6 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1 except plus 4 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
